title: Accounts of North Vietnamese torpedo-boat attacks

content.question: Accounts of North Vietnamese torpedo-boat attacks on United States destroyers in the Gulf of Tonkin during the summer of 1964 were used to justify which of the following United States actions in Vietnam?

choices.label: Delivery of a formal diplomatic protest to Hanoi
Escalation of the American war effort
Withdrawal of all American military advisers

content.answer: Escalation of the American war effort
